name: donut king
description:
how to play:
  • Controls
    • Move - WASD
    • Slash - LMB
  • Slash enemy donuts to stop them from pushing you
  • Stepping out of the blue zone makes you lose your sword
  • Going too far out of the sprinkle zone will cause you to lose health, and if you reach the chocolate frosting zone, you'll die!
  • Primary Mission: Survive.
credits:
